data.title: Greater Project Mod v1.2 file
meta_keywords: greater project mod for victoria 2 heart of darkness
data.meta_description: Welcome to the twelfth version of the Greater Project Mod! In this new version there is a changelog in the mod .rar but here are the main changes as always:
data.text:
You can now build the Titanic if you are a great power and research certain technologies.

Improved the probability of Argentina being formed, now if it reaches a certain year the AI ​​​​does not need all its cores to make the decision.

Changed the Prussian flag to the one of the time.

Argentina can now also be formed with Entre Ríos and Corrientes if you have all the Argentine cores.

Created decision to form the Golden Circle for the Confederate States if they win the civil war.

Now viceroyalties can be formed if there are claimed provinces without colonizing.

Added set of decisions for the Tanzimat reforms for the Ottoman Empire, the vanilla decision can be made once all the decisions that will reorganize the country little by little have been made. Also, if this decision is not made before a 1885, the empire will be dismantled.

Added decisions for the colonization of the Congo by Belgium if the vote of the major powers decides to cede the territory.

Now the British Raj's decision turns India into a dominion and names it "The Raj", as well as changing its color to dark red.

Now the territories you get from the Conquest of the Chaco depend on the territories you own in the area (Bolivia and Paraguay can dispute their part of the Chaco, with the disputed territory being obtained by whoever makes the decision first, although both will gain cores)

Added decision to change the flag to that of Russia between 1880 and 1900 through reforms that can only be taken if Nicholas II rules.

Modified the flags of the Ottoman Empire, the Italian countries and Imperial Japan to be more pleasing to the eye.

Expanded the options for conquering the desert to avoid bordergore in the Sahara (Now all the desert is conquered with decisions)

Added decisions to give territories to the Spanish viceroyalties if you conquer any of their cores after forming them, so that if you conquer Florida for example, you can give them to the viceroyalty of New Spain.

Created an annexation event for African countries if they are in a European's sphere, to prevent some uncivilized countries from remaining on the continent years after the Berlin conference.

Added 3 decisions to claim Byzantine territories, one to acquire cores in the Balkans, one to obtain them in the Anatolian peninsula, and one to completely dismantle the Ottoman Empire.

Viceroyalties can now be formed if there are uncolonized claimed provinces, to avoid having to wait for the division of the Chaco, for example.

Added the disintegration of the Ottoman Empire through a congress through which the Balkans can be liberated in different ways, by choosing a host for the conference and then choosing the way of dismantlement.

Added the decision to organize Vietnam and Laos.

Changed the flag of the Byzantine Empire to the historical one, that is yellow and red.

Now the decision to found the national bank grants you benefits such as being able to take out larger loans and import cheaper goods from other countries.

Reworked the system of changing governments through events, modified small tweaks for a better game experience and more control over the form of government.

Now when you form the Byzantine Empire, you are given cores in Macedonia and Albania, but the decision decreases less infamy (-8).

The Treaty of Guadalupe-Hidalgo can only be taken once and only if Mexico is not a puppet or sub-state of other nation.

Added possibility of a second Opium War if the United Kingdom wins the first one and conquers Hong Kong.

Improved the event chain of the Beijing convention, creating a new event to inform Russia if China accepts the treaty in which it obtains the russian cores in Manchuria.

Added changes to France's government throughout the century, depending on support from liberals, reactionaries, etc...

Uncivilized reforms that give you tech points when conquering now give you 0.05% more.

Added imperialist expansion decision in Indochina for major powers, plus a CB that unlocks with the decision.

The decision to colonize Algeria now has a chance to cause a war with France, as an event now triggers for the African country when making the decision.

Dutch expansion events in Indonesia now create wars where the attacker is the Netherlands and not the native countries of the area, so their allies are now excluded of the wars.

The Holy Roman Empire can now be formed with any germanic country (Yes, I've finally added it permanently)

Some of the mod's decision images have been changed, improving immersion and quality.

The annexation of Egypt by the great powers after the Berlin conference can now provoke a war, as the annexation of Ethiopia, that was also reworked for this version.

The CB for establishing protectorate and demanding concession now have two phases, costing more infamy in early-game and reducing its cost in late-game.

Optimized flags of some countries that were taking up a lot of memory, changed also the flag of Austria to a less coloured one.

Changed UI of the trade section, now the resources are better organized and therefore there is more space in case I want to add more in the future.

Changed distribution of the regions in the northeast of France, now there is one more region and the "Franche-Comté" has been replaced by "Ardennes".

Now in the Treaty of Guadalupe-Hidalgo, the territories that the USA conquers from Mexico that are not core US are returned to Mexican hands.

Now it is more likely that you will get the Berlin Conference event for the scramble for Africa if you are rank 1.

Added rebels at the start of the 1836 campaign in the USCA, making it easier for it to disintegrate.

In Mozambique the life rating is now lower, so the colonization of the area does not start at the start of the campaign.

AI now cannot use small conquest CB, and player can only use it with civilized countries if it is civilized and with uncivilized if it is uncivilized.

Added Boer Wars translation

Fixed bug with rare annexation of Japan by any country intervening in Boshin War

Fixed bug with Argentina or some silver countries not joining when forming silver viceroyalty with Spain

Translated NEUTRALITY_EFFECT

Mexican flag is now the historical one

Now in the CB for acquiring allied cores, the claimed states are indicated in peace

Now the Texas flag is historical

Changed some brightly colored vanilla flags

Invention events in the WW1 campaign for the UK no longer jump.

AI now buys the Gold Coast if it has the Ashanti region in possession, otherwise it does not make the decision.

Changed the name of the Viceroyalty of New Spain, from "New Spain" to "Viceroyalty of New Spain".

Fixed bug with Sudan flag bugged when it was an absolute monarchy after being liberated.

Now the territory you return to your ally is indicated in the CB of conquering allied cores

Now the capitals are set correctly when forming viceroyalties with Spain

Fixed decision to form Iberia (Now it is formed correctly)

Now the province of Lima does not have 3 life_rating.

Fixed armies of the WW1 campaign

Optimized code of some vanilla files, solving bugs, inconsistencies, etc...

Now Panama is independent in the 1914 campaign.

The decision to Create Budapest now has a custom image and not the generic one in vanilla.

In the Hungarian Rebellion event, Hungary's capital is correctly changed to Budapest, preventing the game from choosing a random province

Added custom oob to Spain in the 1914 campaign, solving the bug of the isolated armies in the Caribbean islands and the Philippines.

Some bugged names like the "Covilha" province in Portugal that messed up the game map have been changed and now do not cause bugs

Fixed vanilla translation error in the trade tab when hovering over the resource price

East Timor is now not a core of Portugal

In the rebellion between Krakow and Austria, Krakow now does not call its allies to war, thus avoiding a full-scale war between Russia and Austria

Fixed the options for the Boer Wars event, now no two options do the same thing.
